body.name: ViewSonic Omni VX2428 24 Inch Gaming Monitor 180hz 0.5ms 1080p IPS with FreeSync Premium, Frameless, HDMI, and DisplayPort, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 6 mins
features: SEE THE DIFFERENCE: 24 Inch Full HD (1920x1080p) IPS gaming monitor with thin bezels
MAXIMIZED GAMEPLAY: 180Hz refresh rate and 0.5ms (MPRT) response time for ultimate gaming experience
ULTRA-SMOOTH GAMING: AMD FreeSync Premium technology enables fluid and tear-free gameplay
ENHANCED VIEWING COMFORT: Flicker-Free technology and Blue Light Filter for reduced eye fatigue
HDR10 CONTENT SUPPORT: For deep contrast, rich color, and vibrant details
FLEXIBLE CONNECTIVITY: The VX2428 supports laptops, PCs, Macs and more with HDMI, and DisplayPort inputs
body.description: The ViewSonic OMNI™ VX2428 is a 24” (23.8” Viewable) Full HD monitor built for gaming and entertainment. With a sleek 3-sided frameless design, the VX2428 provides a seamless viewing experience for multi-monitor gaming setups. Featuring a high 180Hz* refresh rate, 0.5ms (MPRT) response time and AMD FreeSync Premium technology, this monitor virtually eliminates screen tearing and stuttering for a fluid gaming experience. Two HDMI (v1.4) inputs, and one DisplayPort (v1.2) input offers flexible connectivity for both general use and entertainment. *180Hz refresh rate with DisplayPort

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ViewSonic VX2428 24" OMNI 1080p 180Hz 1ms Gaming Monitor with AMD FreeSync Premium With a sleek 3-sided frameless design, the VX2428 provides a seamless viewing experience for multi-monitor gaming setups. Featuring a high 180Hz* refresh rate, 0.5ms (MPRT) response time and AMD FreeSync Premium technology, this monitor virtually eliminates screen tearing and stuttering for a fluid gaming experience. Two HDMI (v1.4) inputs, and one DisplayPort (v1.2) input offers flexible connectivity for both general use and entertainment. Features PREMIUM GAMING FEATURES AMD FREESYNC PREMIUM STUNNING FULL HD RESOLUTION FLEXIBILE CONNECTIVITY

Features PREMIUM GAMING FEATURES No compromises and great performance for everyday gaming includes a nimble IPS panel with 180Hz refresh rate for ultra-smooth gameplay. In addition, a 0.5ms (MPRT) response time allows you to react quickly and game with precision. AMD FREESYNC PREMIUM This monitor is equipped with AMD FreeSync Premium which seamlessly synchronizes the frame rate output between your graphics card and monitor. This dynamic refresh rate effectively eliminates image tearing, stuttering, and jerkiness for smooth gameplay. STUNNING FULL HD RESOLUTION Enjoy a premium viewing experience with stunning Full HD resolution – almost twice as powerful as standard HD resolution. FLEXIBILE CONNECTIVITY Quick and flexible connectivity options include 2x HDMI 1.4, 1x DisplayPort 1.2 and audio out. Wall mountable VESA 100x100mm compatibility adds additional convenience and versatility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality screen, no issues.
reviews.reviewText: Quality monitor, no issues, no broken pixels. Latency is excellent.Freesync/gsync mode, MPRT (ULMB/ELMB mode) work as expected, note they don't work together just so you know. The "view mode" presets aren't great. FPS mode makes darks too dark, brights too bright makes visiblity worse. RTS/Moba presets enables auto dimming and is too sharp.Stick to Standard mode and manually set response time to ultra fast, set black stabilization between 50-100 for visibility, and enable "overclocking" for 180Hz. This monitor has "HDR" but I have not used the HDR until today (things are looking decent with Windows11 and AutoHDR after calibration, more testing is needed, FH5 looks excellent with real HDR). Simple WHQL drivers are available online from viewsonic.Stand is sturdy metal though a bit too large, I have it raised up on a small box to keep it out of the way until I get a vesa mount for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous...but a little too much motion blur in games
reviews.reviewText: This is the best HDR monitor I've ever seen— and the .5 ms and 185 Hz are crazy fast. BUT, I could still notice out of the corner of my eye every once in awhile, especially in FPS and action games, motion blur around the outer edges of the monitor and it was just a little too distracting and would take me out of the moment. Turning on software motion blur in games actually masked the monitor's motion blur fairly well— but I hate any motion blur at all. It makes me sick. I ended up returning it to get a monitor with a black frame/strobing function. It's a shame because I REALLY liked this monitor and I think for most people it'd be a great entry level gaming option. The colors and quality of it make your games POP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great monitor for the price. The quality is great, although every now and then it takes a little bit to load. The buttons on the bottom of the monitor are slightly difficult to use but get easier when you use them a lot. Overall 4/5 stars and would recommend to others who need a monitor and don't want to spend a lot of money on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is better than what i was expecting. haven't had it long just got it today but loving it so far. the bar around the screen is soo small compared to what I'm used to but it is there, and for longevity reasons that's a good thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buena pantalla calidad precio
reviews.reviewText: Es una muy buena pantalla, la calidad es buena, el soporte se siente de muy buena calidad y es muy solido, soporta HDR se puede hacer overclock para que vaya a 180hz, una cosa mala son los parlantes integrados que tienen la calidad es horrible, te sacan de un apuro pero es mejor que te compres unos parlantes decentes aunque no es que puedas pedir unos parlantes excelentes por el precio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sangrados de luz

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: El equipo me llego con al rededor 5 pixeles muertos. Sucedio luego de jugar intensamente COD por al rededor 5 horas. Deberían revisar la calidad del panel.Por otra parte, se agradece que tenga hasta 180hz por overdrive y sea IPS con un buen rango de color, el tiempo de respuesta es adecuado y el freesync premium ayuda bastante para la fluidez en juegos.Lo recomiendo teniendo en cuenta que seguramente mi problema con pixeles muertos fue por mala suerte.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: me llegó hace poco, lo probaré más tiempo y volveré a reseñar, tiene parlantes incluidos, no son de muy buena calidad. pero se agradece que los tengas y más por el precio, me parece que está, más que bien, se siente solido, un poco pesado y eso me gusta. la base tiene unas gomas rugosas y brindan buen agarre se sienten muy fiables. pronto daré mi opinion de uso.PD: solo viene con un cable Display Port no incluye cable HDMI.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente monitor, ya quiero el segundo haha
reviews.reviewText: El diseño muy minimalista y elegante, no sé mucho de especificaciones técnicas pero lo compré para jugar mi Xbox y como pantalla extra para mi lap y la verdad cumple muy bien su función. Me preocupe algo al principio por un pequeño detalle en un barde de la pantalla pero parece ser defecto de fábrica y no a dado ningún problema.

The media could not be loaded. El monitor llegó sin ningún rasguño y es bueno por el precio, es mejor que el que tengo para la PC (Samsung) y costó lo mismo, eso si las bocinas se escuchan de mala calidad pero casi siempre jugaré con cascos
Ips, .5ms, 180hz ,sleek bezels , freesync/gsync , minimal ghosting for just around 13k what else we need !!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Product is best but 180hz wrong information hai moniter 144hz ka hai
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded.
This Monitor is a great deal for the Price! Amazing Colours, High Refresh Rate (goes upto 180Hz with Overclocking) and great Quality overall! Worth the Buy! 💯
